title: Interval Notation Overview
text: Open parentheses "(" and ")" represent excluded bounds, while closed parentheses "[" and "]" represent included bounds. If two separate ranges don't overlap, then we can use "U" (union) to combine them into the same expression.

title: Solving Each Inequality for X
text: We can solve each inequality. $$4x-1<7$$ becomes $$x<2$$, and $$2x+8 \geq 4$$ becomes $$x \geq -2$$

title: Creating Our Notation
text: Using the general guide given in the previous hints, we can write the solution [-2, 2)
